song_name: Athletic Theme (PAL Version) Super Mario World
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Athletic Theme (PAL Version) Super Mario World is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Athletic Theme (PAL Version) Super Mario World is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
